title: Whereas by proclamation dated the fifth day of May, 1684, we the Lord Deputy and Council, did for the reasons therein exprest, restrain the transportation of all sorts of corn, meal and mault, out of this kingdom, unto any place whatsoever beyond the seas untill Michaelmas next ... by the Lord Deputy and Council, Arran.
author: Ireland. Lord Deputy.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Benjamin Took ... and are to be sold by Mary Crooke ...,
